verses.name: Revelation 5:7
verses.text: And he came and took the book out of the right hand of him that sat upon the throne.

verses.name: Revelation 5:8
verses.text: And when he had taken the book, the four beasts and four and twenty elders fell down before the Lamb, having every one of them harps, and golden vials full of odours, which are the prayers of saints.

verses.name: Revelation 5:9
verses.text: And they sung a new song, saying, Thou art worthy to take the book, and to open the seals thereof: for thou wast slain, and hast redeemed us to God by thy blood out of every kindred, and tongue, and people, and nation;
